statements: DELETE FROM CustomerShippingPreferences WHERE shipping_cost > 50.00 AND shipping_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM CustomerShippingPreferences WHERE customer_id = 100 AND shipping_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM CustomerShippingPreferences WHERE shipping_cost > 50 AND shipping_preference = 'Express';
DELETE FROM customer_shipping_preferences WHERE customer_id = 101 AND preference_date > '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM transportation_sector WHERE transportation_mode = 'Air' AND sector_id < 50;
DELETE FROM ShippingOrders WHERE order_id = 201 AND customer_id = 101;
DELETE FROM customer_preferences WHERE customer_id = 123 AND shipping_option = 'Express';
